header: God Will Punish Judah and Jerusalem
A Warning to Women of Jerusalem

verse: At that time the Lord will take away everything that makes them proud: their beautiful ankle bracelets, their headbands, their necklaces shaped like the moon,
their scarves, ankle chains, the cloth belts worn around their waists, their bottles of perfume, and charms,
their fine robes, capes, shawls, and purses,
their mirrors, linen dresses, turbans, and long shawls.
